short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Designed for seamless wireless presentation and collaboration that allows smooth casting on their BenQ Board.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Designed for seamless wireless presentation and collaboration that allows smooth casting on their BenQ Board. Users can also watch and control all digital content on the display by mirroring the display screen on their own devices.
v1.6.0.0 Release note :
Document sharing: Users can now share, zoom, scroll, and navigate their Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and PDF documents from the BenQ Board.
